sites.title: Assistto: we transform formules in results
sites.description: Responsive corporative website, with sliders, animations on scroll, embedded cryptography (psssst... the password is potatoisgood), which utilizes native ES6 modules (compatible with any modern web browser).
icons: Este projeto utiliza tecnologia de ponta ECMAScript 2015 (ES6)
Este projeto utiliza o compilador Dart Sass
Este projeto utiliza recursos do FontAwesome
Este projeto faz uso da biblioteca Swiper

libraries.description: Dynamically generate title and metatags, making your website more organized and simplifying build of (almost) library-less projects.
A really minimal and simple ES6 module that uses eval() for basic and flexible localization or interpolation.
